title: Communications Sales & Leasing to Present at Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Media, Communications & Entertainment Conference
content: LITTLE ROCK, Ark., Sept. 3, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Communications Sales & Leasing, Inc. ("CS&L") (Nasdaq:CSAL) announced today that its SVP, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer, Mark Wallace, is scheduled to present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Media, Communications & Entertainment Conference. The presentation is scheduled for 6:00pm (Central Time) on Wednesday, September 9, 2
